Name: Dolce & Gelato
Review Text: These churros were definitely on the better end of the spectrum. They were freshly made and I preferred these ones than others I tried while in the city. I think €11 is very expensive, and I live in London so they're definitely over priced. …

Name: Dolce & Gelato
Review Text: These guys were super funny and nice to everyone, and made the rainy day better for sure. On top of having  fresh churros made when ordered they were sure to be very clear with sizes and the ordering process (despite the clear inebriation …

Name: Dolce & Gelato
Review Text: Fairly expensive, charged me 10€ for the cookies and cream waffle with a gelato ice cream. Ended up being way too sweet since he added chocolate syrup on top of everything 😱

Name: Dolce & Gelato
Review Text: Amazing waffles, prices a little steep but I suppose thats because of the location. The staff, however, were not so amazing. There were 2 guys and they both had horrible attitudes towards me and my partner, rushing me to order and shouting …

Name: Dolce & Gelato
Review Text: Ordered a single Waffel with kinder on top and was charged 8 euros! Also it was preheated and not freshly made. You can find places around city centre where they make fresh Waffel with better taste.

Name: Dolce & Gelato
Review Text: Absolutely delicious crepes! Came here at the end of every night in Amsterdam to get a banana & nutella crepe. Staff were also very happy and friendly, and remembered our order after just the first time!

Name: Dolce & Gelato
Review Text: 10€ for the worst crepe ever. Poorly made and completely unpractical to eat on feet. Biggest tourist trap in Amsterdam.

Name: Dolce & Gelato
Review Text: Quick service. However not sure on the flavour of the chocolate waffle I had. The taste and texture was not what I expected  and certainly not a traditional waffle.

Name: Dolce & Gelato
Review Text: Disgusting! We asked for the banana Crepe, the guy told me they have no bananas. So we got the banana Crepe with just chocolate. Price was 6,5€ instead of 4,5€. Really awkward but ok whatever. And THEN after one bite of the Crepe, it was bad, the dough was rotten and not cooked, so basically rotten raw dough. I almost threw up.

Name: Dolce & Gelato
Review Text:
8€ for a muffin
Price is not on products and you can't change after order

Name: Dolce & Gelato
Review Text: Crepes were delicious and made very carefully and nicely. Staff were very nice. However $32 is astonishing for two crepes and a waffle. Far more expensive than equivalent snacks further down the block. Clientele are late-night revelers, and I'm pretty sure they're preying on said revelers' inebriated faculties!

Name: Dolce & Gelato
Review Text: Tried to charge 12€ for three churros. I walked away, with them screaming curses at me

Name: Dolce & Gelato
Review Text: No visible sign for the prices. It is just a place to rip off people. Rude employees and tasteless food.

Name: Dolce & Gelato
Review Text: Cost us 10 euros each for a waffle and when we were told the price, even his colleague seemed surprised. They were so rude to all the customers in the shop, not just us. They mocked some Asian tourists when they left the shop and also …

Name: Dolce & Gelato
Review Text: BAD. Zero stars. Do not come to this place. Charged $11 for a waffle. Such a joke. Bad service. One of the workers even stuck his hand or water bottle in my pocket? Not okay at all. It should be illegal to not have prices listed and then …

Name: Dolce & Gelato
Review Text: Very expensive for a teeny tiny scoop! €2.50 for what was like a child's size serving anywhere else. No tasting before purchase; what kind of ice cream shop doesn't offer taste spoons?

Name: Dolce & Gelato

Name: Dolce & Gelato
Review Text: This is Tourist trap!!!! Don't go there. They ripping off the people.No visible sign with the prices. 11euros for a small portion churros(fried dough) with Nutella it's astronomic.

Name: Dolce & Gelato
Review Text: Too pricy. 8 euros for 8 pieces churros. No smaller portions. And too oily I threw most of it. And you can't find prices shown anywhere.

Review Text: Just another waffle scam shop. I hope these people will go out of business someday because everyone reads these reviews. Don't ever go there! It's a scam. Prices are invented.

Review Text:
everything here looks amazing, but the taste is horrible, waffles are not fresh and the prices...omg.

Name: Dolce & Gelato
Review Text: The Churros were made fresh in front of us and tasted very nice with whipped cream and nutella, staff were very friendly, but the only thing this place lacks is seating as it was raining outside so we had to stand and eat in the corner of the store.

Review Text: No prices signs and the guy wouldn’t tell us he prices when we asked. (Its overpriced) He took my card to do tap payment and wouldn’t give it back right away. Stay away from this place.
